channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Lab 00
item.description: (Download) Most the instructions here are taken from Chapter 1 of Getting Used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown by Ismay and Kennedy and this associated tutorial.. See also Chapter 1 of Statistical Inference via Data Science by Ismay and Kim. Installation Download and install R by going to https://cloud.r-project.org. If you are a Windows user: Click on “Download R for Windows”, then click on “base”, then click on the Download link.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
